## CommentAuthorCollection.FindByName method

Find author in a collection by name.

```csharp
public ICommentAuthor[] FindByName(string name)
```

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| name | String | Name of an author to find. |

Author or null.
